exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : Z, Pell x y <-> Pell y x" on hypothesis of type "y < x".

In environment b_nat : nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat Hb : 2 <= Z.of_nat b_nat x, y : Z Hlt : 0 <= y H : forall x y : Z, Pell y x -> Pell x y H0 : forall x y : Z, Pell x y -> Pell y x H2 : (y ?= x) = Lt Unable to unify "(0 ?= α (S ?M2231)) = Gt" with "(x ?= 0) = Lt".

original: intros hyp. destruct hyp as [Hlt Hpell]. assert (Hxy : x > 0). -- apply Pell_sym in Hpell. assert (Hpos : x >= 0). ++ apply alpha_ge_0.
